name: Ficra
long_description: Ficra is a live, visual map of your usersâ€™ journeys, both inside and outside your product. Our AI automatically gives you realtime visibility into marketing and product funnels: every ad, email, A/B test, push notification, and in-app flow your users see. With Ficra, marketing teams can increase conversions, compliance teams can flag and fix violations, and product teams can accelerate their workflows.
one_liner: Visual map of every ad, email, flow, and screen your users see.
